name: Smart Read Later Organizer
description: An intelligent AI agent that helps you manage and organize your 'read later' content. I learn your reading preferences, categorize articles, and deliver them at optimal times.

skills.name: Save Article for Later
skills.description: Saves a URL to your reading queue. I'll fetch the content, categorize it, and deliver it at the optimal time.

parts.text: ‚úÖ Article saved! I'll categorize it and add it to your reading queue.

skills.name: Show Reading Queue
skills.description: Shows your current reading queue with all saved articles.

parts.text:

   Category: Tech
   https://example.com/article1

skills.name: Show Categories
skills.description: Shows your articles grouped by category.

skills.name: Show Reading Statistics
skills.description: Shows your reading statistics and patterns.
